verses.plain: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

tokens.t: . Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

verses.plain: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

tokens.t: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

verses.plain: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.

tokens.t: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.

verses.plain: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.

tokens.t: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.

verses.plain: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.

tokens.t: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.

verses.plain: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
